title: Trinity Seven - Levi Ninden
alternative_title: トリニティセブン レヴィ忍伝 ; Trinity Seven: Levi Ninden ; Trinity Seven Levi Story
status: トリニティセブン レヴィ忍伝 ; Trinity Seven: Levi Ninden ; Trinity Seven Levi Story
description:
Description :
        The Biblia Academy's Headmaster has asked to a Trinity Seven Kazama Levi, looking for the mythic weapon "Murasame", the legendary demonic sword. Along with Charme (Big Boobs), a kouhai mage that admires to Levi, she will infiltrate to a town where is said "Murasame" is sealed, however a Breakdown Phenomenon occurs----- Aiming to that treasure Lugh appears, who is the same "Envy" mage, also going to war, the leader of the Ninja Army's Five Shadow Magic Elements, Kashin Ryuhime, the story of a ninja having a heroic battleッス!!
